text: Faunist Park La Torbiera is a biopark and consists of an area open to the public and a protected area for wildlife preservation. It was established in Agrate Conturbia, Piedmont, Italy in 1977 to preserve and study some animal species in danger of extinction.Francesca Monza â€“ Fausto Barbagli, La scienza nei musei, Milano, Orme, 2006, p. 28. == References == Category:Zoos in Italy Category:Province of Novara Category:1977 establishments in Europe Category:1970s establishments in Italy
title: La Torbiera Zoo
